data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "What are the qualities of a good boss or manager? Include specific details and examples."
data.answer: First of all, a good boss must have leadership and management skill. That is to say, a boss is supposed to lead and manage his employees well in order to achieve his business goal. For instance, a boss must know his employees well and can delegate power and tasks to each one of them, so that the business can be run in a professional manner. Secondly, a good boss must be decisive, as most of the time, it is up to the boss who will make decisions that are critical to the business. And such decisions can greatly impact the success of the business in the next move. These are the two most important qualities I can think of as being a good boss. (124字)
